snippet: If Stewart does not return to the blue-collar style fans have become accustomed to, there could be implications for Stewart-Haas Racing and Nascar.
abstract: Nascar fans are waiting for Tony Stewart to return to his blue-collar style, after accident on Aug 9 that killed Kevin Ward, Jr; Stewart has ability to attract fans, big-money sponsors and premier drivers, but if he does not return to being the same driver fans have become accustomed to, there could be implications for both Stewart-Haas Racing and Nascar.
lead_paragraph: If Stewart does not return to the blue-collar style fans have become accustomed to, there could be implications for Stewart-Haas Racing and Nascar.

headline.main: Nascar Awaits the Return of Tony Stewart’s Gruff and Invaluable Persona
headline.print_headline: Nascar Awaits the Return of Stewart’s Gruff and Invaluable Persona
